mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbuser (userName, passWord, phone, email, created, updated) VALUE (#{userName},#{passWord},#{phone},#{email},#{created},#{updated})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tbuser WHERE userName = #{userName}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbuser WHERE phone = #{phone}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbuser WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM tbuser WHERE userName = #{username} AND passWord = #{password}
